details.title: Import plans
steps: Click on the plus button on the Plan Import dialog
Select the plan files and click Open. Pdf and Image files are supported

details.title: Insert lowest floor plan
steps: Select the floor plan on the Plan Import dialog
The selected plan opens in a separate dialog
Click and drag a box around the floor plan
Click the Floor button to insert the plan as a floor

details.title: Trace floor
steps: If the Envelop is not visible go to View -> Toolbars... and tick the box for Envelop Toolbar
Select the pen tool
Create a face by tracing the contour of the floor plan
Delete unneeded separation with the Erase tool

details.title: Insert side views
steps: On the Plan Import dialog, select a plan that contains a side view
The selected plan opens in a separate dialog
Click and drag a box around the side view on the plan
Click the respective button depending on the cardinal direction of the side view
Select a point on the plan and then the corresponding point on the floor to snap the two points together
Select another point on the plan and the corresponding point on the floor to scale the plan accordingly

details.title: Pull up floor
steps: Select the Envelop Push-Pull tool
Select the floor face and drag up the lowest floor using the side view as a reference
Click to accept the preview

details.title: Create remaining floors
steps: Insert next floor plan from the Plan Import dialog
Pull up floor with the Envelop Push-Pull tool using a side view as reference
Repeat until all floors except the roof are done

details.title: Create roof
steps: Insert necessary plans
Trace the roof from a side view with the pen tool
Pull the roof over the building with the Envelop Push-Pull tool. Sometimes it is easier to subtract instead of adding

details.title: Create dormers
steps: Move the side view of the dormer into the house
Set camera to Parallel Projection
Draw the outline with the pen tool on the sloped face of the roof
Select the Push-Pull tool and double-click the outline
Add a roof on the dormer as needed

details.title: Draw windows and other details
steps: Make sure the plan for a window is aligned with the respective wall. If not use the Plan Manager Tool to move a plan around
Use the pen tool to draw windows and other details like separations between different wall materials

details.title: Apply materials to faces
steps: Select a material on the Materialization dialog
Click a face to apply the material

details.title: Scale building
steps: Search a readable and preferably long measurement on a plan
Select the Scale model tool
Click the end points of a measurement and enter the length in the input box

details.title: Set north direction
steps: Select the Orientation tool
Click somewhere
Click again to accept the previewed orientation

details.title: Export Surface area
steps: Select Area Output, a dialog with surface area in a table will open
Click the copy button to copy the results to the clipboard
Paste the results for example into Excel
